Interface PHMeter

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device, Sensor<Real>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimulatedPHMeter
public interface PHMeter extends Sensor<Real>
Interface for pH meters.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
